text:
JFYI,

There is no matching "ErrorDocument ### /error/HTTP_NOT_ACCEPTABLE.html.var"
template directive for the HTTP_NOT_ACCEPTABLE page included in the 'error/'
directory.

Either it's not to be used (and thus should be removed), or has been omitted
from the default 'httpd[-std].conf' file by accident.


Best Regards,
Rolf Sponsel
creator: Rolf.Sponsel@kstr.lth.se
slive@apache.org
text:
Actually, I backed this out and removed the error doc, because it can't provide
as much info as the internal error doc can.
